mapper.insert: insert into CHANGERECORDINFO ( REFSERIALNO, TABLENAME, CUSTNO, APKIND, RECORDBEFORE, RECORDAFTER ) values ( #{refserialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tablename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apkind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordbefore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordafter,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into fdacfinalresult ( SERIALNO, CUSTNO, APKIND, WORKDATE, APDT,
APTM, STATUS, FROM_TRADEACCOID, FROM_BANKSERIALID, FROM_FUNDCODE,
TO_TRADEACCOID, TO_BANKSERIALID, TO_FUNDCODE, APPAMT, APPVOL,
ACKAMT, ACKVOL, FUNDCORPNO ) values ( #{serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apkind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apdt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{aptm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromTradeaccoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromBankserialid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromFundCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{toTradeaccoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toBankserialid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tofundCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appamt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appvol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ackamt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ackvol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundcorpno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
